I think you'll find the plot intriguing and the acting top-notch.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more cerebral and thought-provoking, "Elizabeth" might be right up your alley. This 1998 drama stars Fanny Ardant and Eric Cantona in a tale of the early years of Elizabeth I's reign and her challenges as a monarch. With a strong focus on character development and political intrigue, this movie will keep you engaged and thinking long after the credits roll.
